text: Dar on co (ruzi qijomat, dar vaqti hisoʙ) har kas har ci kardaast, podosasro xohad did. Agar neki karda ʙosad, ʙarojas neki ast va agar ʙadi karda ʙosad, ʙarojas ʙadi ast. Va hamaro ʙa sui Alloh mavloi haqiqijason ʙozgardonida mesavand, pas ahli cannat ʙa cannat doxil mesavad va ahli duzax ʙa duzax va hamai on ʙuton, ki musrikon ʙa ʙotil meparastidand, noʙud mesavand
